member.name: T:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.ClockState
member.summary: A data structure containing information about the time control and state of the clock.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.ClockState.WhiteTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time white has on the clock.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.ClockState.BlackTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time black has on the clock.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.ClockState.WhiteIncrement
member.summary: Gets or sets the additional time (increment) white receives after each move.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.ClockState.BlackIncrement
member.summary: Gets or sets the additional time (increment) black receives after each move.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.ClockState.MovesToGo
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of moves remaining until the next time control.

member.name: T:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.CompletionCriteria
member.summary: A class with data that tells the engine when it has reached the end of the requested evaluation session.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.CompletionCriteria.PonderTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the max time to calculate for.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.CompletionCriteria.MaxDepth
member.summary: Gets or sets the max depth.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.CompletionCriteria.Mate
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of moves to look for mate.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.CompletionCriteria.MaxNodes
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of nodes to search.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.CompletionCriteria.Infinite
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the analysis should be infinite.

member.name: T:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EngineOutputSegment
member.summary: A parsed, single piece of output from the engine.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EngineOutputSegment.Output
member.summary: Gets or sets the raw output string.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EngineOutputSegment.Error
member.summary: Gets or sets the raw error string.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EngineOutputSegment.Line
member.summary: Gets or sets the parse evaluated line.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EngineOutputSegment.BestLines
member.summary: Gets or sets the best lines.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EngineOutputSegment.Result
member.summary: Gets or sets the result. Only used when engine reports that it found the best move in a given situation (noted by the 'bestmove' UCI keyword).

member.name: T:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EvaluatedLine
member.summary: A series of chess moves parsed by the engine and including an evaluation.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EvaluatedLine.LineSan
member.summary: Gets or sets the SAN line text.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EvaluatedLine.LineUci
member.summary: Gets or sets the UCI line text.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EvaluatedLine.LineRank
member.summary: Gets or sets the rank of this line compared with other lines, if multiple lines were requested.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EvaluatedLine.Depth
member.summary: Gets or sets the depth of this line.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EvaluatedLine.Evaluation
member.summary: Gets or sets the evaluation of this line.

member.name: M:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EvaluatedLine.ToString
member.summary: Converts this line into a string representation.
member.returns: The string representation of this line.

member.name: T:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EvaluatePositionResult
member.summary: A class storing the final evaluation and series of moves according to the engine.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EvaluatePositionResult.StartingPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the starting position.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EvaluatePositionResult.MaxDepth
member.summary: Gets the max depth.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EvaluatePositionResult.Lines
member.summary: Gets or sets all the lines, if multiple lines were requested with the UCI option MultiPV.

member.name: T:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EvaluationScore
member.summary: A class collecting the different types of evaluations returnable by the engine.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EvaluationScore.MovesUntilMate
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of moves until mate.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EvaluationScore.Centipawns
member.summary: Gets or sets the centipawn eval of the position.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EvaluationScore.DecimalScore
member.summary: Gets the centipawn eval as a decimal.

member.name: M:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.EvaluationScore.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of this evaluation.

member.summary: Gets or sets the move in SAN notation.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.MoveFilter.UCI
member.summary: Gets or sets the move in UCI move notation.

member.summary: An option that can be configured to adjust engine evaluation behavior.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the option.

member.summary: Gets or sets the type of option this is.

member.summary: Gets or sets the upper bound of the options.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.Options.EngineOption.Maximum
member.summary: Gets or sets the lower bound of the option.

member.summary: Gets or sets the default value.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.Options.EngineOption.ValidValues
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of valid values.

member.name: T:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.Options.OptionType
member.summary: The different types of options.

member.name: F:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.Options.OptionType.Boolean
member.summary: A UCI option that has a value of either true or false.

member.name: F:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.Options.OptionType.NumberRange
member.summary: A UCI option that is a free-form number within an upper bound and/or lower bound.

member.name: F:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.Options.OptionType.MultipleChoice
member.summary: A UCI option with a enumerated set of valid options to choose from.

member.summary: A UCI option that can trigger a command to be sent to the engine.

member.name: F:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.Options.OptionType.Text
member.summary: A free-form string option.

member.summary: Gets or sets the boolean value of the option.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.OptionValue.IntegerValue

member.summary: Writes a JSON value from a nullable time span.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the engine should be set to debug mode.

member.summary: Gets or sets the position to start evaluating from.

member.summary: Gets or sets the criteria the engine uses to know when it should stop the evaluation.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.StartEvaluationRequest.SearchMoves
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of moves the engine is allowed to consider in the start position. If the list is null or empty, the engine will consider all moves.

member.summary: Gets or sets the time control and remaining time for the players.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.StartEvaluationRequest.EngineOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of engine options.

member.name: P:Artemis.Analysis.Maki.Model.StartEvaluationResponse.Lines
